titles.title: Native American Business Outreach Act of 2019
To establish the Native American Outreach Program of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.
Native American Business Outreach Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Native American Business Outreach Act of 2019
This bill requires the Small Business Administration to establish a Native American Outreach Program to provide assistance to (1) Native American communities, including Alaska Natives and Native Hawaiians; and (2) small business concerns owned by individuals in those communities or tribes.
